name: Health System
author: UnityVault
description: Complete health management system with damage, healing, death events, armor, regeneration, and invincibility frames.

files.name: HealthSystem.cs
files.description: Main health component - attach to any GameObject that needs health

setupInstructions:
1. Add HealthSystem component to your GameObject
2. Configure max health, armor, and other settings in Inspector
3. Subscribe to events (HealthChanged, DamageTaken, Death, etc.)
4. Call TakeDamage() to apply damage, Heal() to restore health
